name: halo-theme-sakura
description:
Sakura

预览 | 安装 | 更新日志

scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-autoprefix && npm run build-cleancss  && npm run build-js
scripts.build-app-js: babel script/app.js -o script/app.min.js && uglifyjs script/app.min.js -o script/app.min.js
scripts.build-i18n-js: babel script/i18n.js -o script/i18n.min.js && uglifyjs script/i18n.min.js -o script/i18n.min.js
scripts.build-utils-js: babel script/utils.js -o script/utils.min.js && uglifyjs script/utils.min.js -o script/utils.min.js
scripts.build-js: npm run build-app-js && npm run build-i18n-js && npm run build-utils-js
